2002-08-31
The K-Meleon documentation project is an effort to write a complete manual for K-Meleon. Participation is open to anyone willing to help. All contributions, large or small, are very welcome. And very much needed! You don't have to write a full chapter; a small subsection is good enough. Or simply extend/rewrite/correct the text of an exisiting part. No programming knowledge is required, which makes it a great way for non-programmers to contribute to K-Meleon.
Please send all contributing comments, corrections and additions, as plain text files, to the K-Meleon Developers mailing list.
